name: MeteoRun
description:
In this game, you play as Darwin who is trying to collect coins near a volcano, this was all going well until the volcano began to erupt. Now, he must avoid the falling meteors while collecting his precious coins. Normal coins will be worth 100 points, however, the rare coins are worth 500, but are harder to catch. A single meteor could mean the end for Darwin. Will he survive?

This is our second game which was created in a week around the theme of Falling. Enjoy!

Controls:

Left and Right Arrows - Move

Mouse - Cursor
